scripts.integration-tests:backend-only: docker compose -f docker-compose.integration-tests.yml up testDB backend
scripts.start:all: npm start --prefix ./server & npm start --prefix ./client && npm run codegen --prefix ./client
scripts.publish-server:prod: docker build -f ./server/Dockerfile.production ./server -t bdeliencourt/greenmates-server && docker push bdeliencourt/greenmates-server
scripts.publish-client:prod: docker build -f ./client/Dockerfile.production ./client -t bdeliencourt/greenmates-client && docker push bdeliencourt/greenmates-client
